name: Horse Simulator Forest Rider The Texas Stallion Riding Game
name_original: Horse Simulator Forest Rider The Texas Stallion Riding Game
description:
Horse simulator Forest Rider is the game you have been waiting for.
Take control of the horse and rampage the jungle. Walk, Run through the fields and hit everything you find on your way.

If you love horse games you will enjoy this one.

Enjoy the new game of free horse simulation with amazing features and exciting levels. Reach the goals, complete the target.

Game features:

*Funny Creative Rampage obstacles.
*Realistic animation of Horse simulation
*Combines horse rampage with adventure.
*Excellent 3D graphics.


How to Play:-

- Use the joystick to move around the game
- Tap right button to jump
